input.sentences: after graduation she took many pictures .
she took pictures with her family .
she took pictures with people she knew from school .
it was an exciting day for everyone involved .
output.sentences: Hannah was enjoying her special day.
Today she would receive her college diploma.
Her parents could not have been prouder.
They had invited all the relatives to the house after the ceremony
Hannah was the first in her family to graduate college and everyone wanted to share in her joy.
